Metadata.title: Coptic Translator
Metadata.description: Automatically translate English to Coptic and Coptic to English phrases and sentences, free of charge.

Page.english-input-msg: Type or paste English text here
Page.coptic-input-msg: Type or paste Coptic text here
Page.input-length-warning: Input contains multiple lines. Translations may be more inaccurate. Try using one or two lines at a time for better accuracy.

Footer.by-data-from: This translator was created using data from the
Footer.disclaimer-msg: It's not perfect and will sometimes produce inaccurate results, and is not suitable for the Bohairic dialect. Use with caution.
Footer.server-down-err: Server is down. Please try again later.
